001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config;
002
003import org.aeonbits.owner.Config;
004
005/**
006 * Configuration interface for loading framework settings.
007 *
008 * <p>This interface defines configuration properties for the framework,
009 * allowing dynamic retrieval of essential settings from system properties
010 * and external property files.
011 *
012 * <p>The configuration is loaded using a merge policy, which combines
013 * multiple sources, including system properties and classpath properties.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Config.LoadPolicy(Config.LoadType.MERGE)
018@Config.Sources({"system:properties", "classpath:${framework.config.file}.properties"})
019public interface FrameworkConfig extends Config {
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the base package of the project.
023    *
024    * @return The base package name defined in the configuration.
025    */
026   @Key("project.packages")
027   @Separator(";")
028   String[] projectPackages();
029
030   /**
031    * Retrieves the default storage location used by the framework.
032    *
033    * @return The default storage configuration value.
034    */
035   @Key("default.storage")
036   String defaultStorage();
037
038   /**
039    * Retrieves the test environment configuration.
040    *
041    * @return The configured test environment name.
042    */
043   @Key("test.env")
044   String testEnv();
045
046}
